extendedInfo.description: Auto send any kind of SMS via Auto Message. Auto Message is an android application that allows people to schedule messages and to be sent automatically in future.Its time your phone is intelligent enough to send messages without your help. Just enter a contact, time and message and then forget about it.USER GUIDE :Install the application from the market.Launch the application and follow the steps:1.) The home screen Contains the list of Scheduled Messages (which may be empty if there are no scheduled messages for future.)2.) A button to Schedule a new message : This will take the user to a new screen to create a message that is to be scheduled to the future.3.) Users can choose the person from phonebook list and just click on the button below (Save) to save scheduled message . This would schedule birthday/anniversary/custom message(s) to the person selected.Features:Better UI/UX design of the app which makes it highly user friendly and convenient to use. You can also set predefined messages or create your own custom messages to repeat for those birthdays, anniversary daily tasks you always forget.You can also specify a repeat option: hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or yearly.Current version supports SMS messages to be scheduled. More features will be added in subsequent releases.Note:Please give feedback/comments which will help us in improving the app.Keywords: SMS Scheduler, Message Scheduler, Auto SMS, Valentine's day, Valentine's Week, Rose Day, Propose Day, Chocolate Day, Teddy day, Promise Day, Kiss Day, Hug Day, Wish your friend, Birthday, Anniversary, Auto Message, Occasions, Festivals, Floating Binary, Reminder, SMS Sender, Auto SMS Sender, Automatic Message Sender, Send SMS Later, Automatic Sender, Birthday Reminder, Anniversary Reminder.

reviews.title: Overall GREAT App
reviews.comment: Galaxy S4   Sends messages as it\'s supposed to  + On time  <-BIG PLUS     Do have some issues though. - Message does not show in conversation. - Can\'t read sent messages in history. - Does not show time sent in history.  Fix those issues and this app will earn a well deserved 5 star rating Thank you for the great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good app. Scheduled 25 messages out of which 24 went out on the exact time. It sends out the message according to the time on your device and not the actual time, so just be careful about that
